languages.text: Прогулка прошла мирно и надолго запомнилась офицерам, обсуждавшим ее недели спустя. Сильнее всего впечатлилась госпожа Джай Хейдари — с ее стороны то и дело были слышны возгласы "Ах какое было бы место для дворца!" и "Жаль, жаль, что нельзя возить сюда экскурсии для аристократии..."

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. The place made a particular impression on Lady Heydari, and she could be heard saying over and over, "This would make a fine spot for a palace!" and "Pity you can't bring highborns here on tours..."
languages.original_text: Прогулка прошла мирно и надолго запомнилась офицерам, обсуждавшим ее недели спустя. Сильнее всего впечатлилась госпожа Джай Хейдари — с ее стороны то и дело были слышны возгласы "Ах какое было бы место для дворца!" и "Жаль, жаль, что нельзя возить сюда экскурсии для аристократии..."

traits.locale_text: The shore leave was peaceful; the officers went on to discuss it for weeks. Jae Heydari was particularly impressed and kept on saying "What a great place for a palace it would be!" and "What a pity one can't

The shore leave was peaceful; the officers went on to discuss it for weeks. Jae Heydari was particularly impressed and kept on saying "What a great place for a palace it would be!" and "What a pity one can't

The shore leave was peaceful; the officers went on to discuss it for weeks. Jae Heydari was particularly impressed and kept on saying "What a fine spot for a palace this would be!" and "What a pity, it's a real shame one can't bring highborns here on tours..."

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. The place made a particular impression on Lady Heydari, and she could be heard saying over and over, "This would make a fine spot for a palace!" and "Pity you can't bring highborns here on tours..."

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. The place made a particular impression on Lady Heydari, and she could be heard saying over and over, "This would make a fine spot for a palace!" and "Pity you can't bring highborns here on tours..."

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. The place made a particular impression on Lady Heydari, and she could be heard saying over and over, "This would make a fine spot for a palace!" and "Pity you can't bring highborns here on tours..."

languages.text: 岸上的休假风平浪静地结束了。在这之后的几个星期里，船上的军官始终都在谈论这里的奇景。这个地方给海达利女士留下了极为深刻的印象，她一遍又一遍地重复道：“这里实在是太适合建造宫殿了！”以及“可惜不能把贵族都带过来旅游……”
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. The place made a particular impression on Lady Heydari, and she could be heard saying over and over, "This would make a fine spot for a palace!" and "Pity you can't bring highborns here on tours..."

traits.locale_text: 岸上的休假风平浪静地结束了。在这之后的几个星期里，船上的军官始终都在谈论这里的奇景。这个地方给海达利女士留下了极为深刻的印象，她一遍又一遍地重复道：“这里实在是太适合建造宫殿了！”以及“可惜不能把贵族都带过来旅游……”

languages.text: El permiso concluyó sin incidentes, y los oficiales de la nave hablaron sobre ello durante semanas. La experiencia impactó especialmente a lady Heydari, que no dejaba de hacer comentarios como «¡Este sería un lugar magnífico para un palacio!» y «Lástima que no podamos traer nobles de visita...».
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. The place made a particular impression on Lady Heydari, and she could be heard saying over and over, "This would make a fine spot for a palace!" and "Pity you can't bring highborns here on tours..."

traits.locale_text: El permiso concluyó sin incidentes, y los oficiales de la nave hablaron sobre ello durante semanas. La experiencia impactó especialmente a lady Heydari, que no dejaba de hacer comentarios como «¡Este sería un lugar magnífico para un palacio!» y «Lástima que no podamos traer nobles de visita...».

languages.text: 寄港地での休暇は何事もなく終わり、その後何週間も船員たちはそのことを話していた。ヘイダリ嬢は特に感動したようで、「ここは宮殿にふさわしい場所だわ！」「名家の者をツアーに呼べなくて残念ね…」と何度も言っていた。
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. The place made a particular impression on Lady Heydari, and she could be heard saying over and over, "This would make a fine spot for a palace!" and "Pity you can't bring highborns here on tours..."

traits.locale_text: 寄港地での休暇は何事もなく終わり、その後何週間も船員たちはそのことを話していた。ヘイダリ嬢は特に感動したようで、「ここは宮殿にふさわしい場所だわ！」「名家の者をツアーに呼べなくて残念ね…」と何度も言っていた。

languages.text: Der Landgang verlief ohne Zwischenfälle, und die Offiziere des Schiffs sprachen noch wochenlang darüber. Lady Heydari war besonders beeindruckt. Man hörte sie immer wieder sagen: "Das wäre der perfekte Platz für einen Palast" oder "Schade, dass man keine Reisen hierher für Hochwohlgeborene organisieren kann ..."
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. The place made a particular impression on Lady Heydari, and she could be heard saying over and over, "This would make a fine spot for a palace!" and "Pity you can't bring highborns here on tours..."

traits.locale_text: Der Landgang verlief ohne Zwischenfälle, und die Offiziere des Schiffs sprachen noch wochenlang darüber. Lady Heydari war besonders beeindruckt. Man hörte sie immer wieder sagen: "Das wäre der perfekte Platz für einen Palast" oder "Schade, dass man keine Reisen hierher für Hochwohlgeborene organisieren kann ..."

languages.text: La permission se déroule sans accrocs et les officiers du vaisseau en parlent encore des semaines plus tard. Cet endroit a fait forte impression à Dame Heydari, qui répète sans cesse que « ce serait l'endroit idéal pour un palais ! » et qu'il est « dommage qu'on ne puisse y organiser de séjours touristiques pour les nobles... ».
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. The place made a particular impression on Lady Heydari, and she could be heard saying over and over, "This would make a fine spot for a palace!" and "Pity you can't bring highborns here on tours..."

traits.locale_text: La permission se déroule sans accrocs et les officiers du vaisseau en parlent encore des semaines plus tard. Cet endroit a fait forte impression à Dame Heydari, qui répète sans cesse que « ce serait l'endroit idéal pour un palais ! » et qu'il est « dommage qu'on ne puisse y organiser de séjours touristiques pour les nobles... ».

languages.text: İniş sonrasında hiçbir sorun yaşanmıyor ve gemi subayları, sonrasında haftalarca buradan bahsediyor. Bu yer, Leydi Heydari üzerinde öyle özel bir etki bırakıyor ki kaç kez "Buraya saray inşa etmek lazım!" ve "Keşke bu gezegende soylulara tur düzenleyebilsek..." dediği duyuluyor.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. The place made a particular impression on Lady Heydari, and she could be heard saying over and over, "This would make a fine spot for a palace!" and "Pity you can't bring highborns here on tours..."
